title: Create New Experience
text:
\define GenerateLinked(EmpName, ProjName) <$action-createtiddler $basetitle="$EmpName$ - Experience - $ProjName$" text="{{||Experience Entry Template}}" Keywords={{!!Keywords}} Description = {{!!Description}} Notes = {{!!Notes}} Services = {{!!Services}} ProjectName = "$ProjName$" ProjectTitleLink = "$ProjName$" Name = "$EmpName$" EntryType = "Experience" included = "0" tags = "Entry" showonresume= """<$transclude tiddler = {{!!ProjectTitleLink}} field="ResumeDescription" /> {{!!Description}}""" project_text= """<$transclude tiddler = {{!!ProjectTitleLink}} field="ResumeDescription" />""" > <$action-navigate $to=<>/> \end \define GeneratePersonal(EmpName, ProjName) <$action-createtiddler $basetitle="$EmpName$ - Experience - $ProjName$" text="{{||Personal Experience Entry Template}}" Keywords={{!!Keywords}} normaldescription = {{!!Description}} Notes = {{!!Notes}} Services = {{!!Services}} ProjectName = "$ProjName$" ProjectTitleLink = "Personal" Name = "$EmpName$" EntryType = "Experience" included = "0" tags = "Entry" showonresume= """{{!!normaldescription}}""" priority=8 > <$action-navigate $to=<>/> \end \define checkProjectExists(ProjName) <$list filter = "[all[current]!field:ProjectName[]!field:Personal[1]]"> <$list filter="[tag[Entry]field:EntryType[SMAproject]field:title[$ProjName$]]" emptyMessage="This project ($ProjName$) doesn't exist. Make sure the project is an SMA project that exists in this database (If the project is a personal project, select the checkbox). " > \end \define checkNameExists(Name) <$list filter = "[all[current]!field:Name[]]"> <$list filter="[[Employees]getindex[$Name$]]" emptyMessage="This employee ($Name$) doesn't exist. Make sure their name is spelled and capitalized correctly." > \end \define checkAlreadyExists(EmpName, ProjName) <$list filter="[field:title[$EmpName$ - Experience - $ProjName$]]"> """ $EmpName$ already has an experience entry for $ProjName$: [[$EmpName$ - Experience - $ProjName$]].""" \end \define clear() <$action-setfield Associations="" Description="" Keywords="" Name="" Notes="" Personal=0 ProjectName="" Services="" /> \end \define projectSelection() <$list filter="[field:Personal[0]]" > <$select field="ProjectName"> <$list filter="[field:EntryType[SMAproject]]-[[Personal]]"> <$list filter="[field:Personal[1]]" > <$edit-text field="ProjectName" size=100 /> \end \define employeeSelection() <$select field="Name"> <$list filter="[[Employees]indexes[]]"> \end

Enter the information for the new Experience

<$macrocall $name="checkNameExists" Name = {{!!Name}} /> <$macrocall $name="checkProjectExists" ProjName = {{!!ProjectName}} /> <$macrocall $name="checkAlreadyExists" EmpName = {{!!Name}} ProjName = {{!!ProjectName}} /> <$checkbox field="Personal" checked="1" unchecked="0"> Personal Experience |table-style|k |Employee Name|<>| |Project Name|<>| |Services|<$edit-text field="Services" class="text-bar"/>| |Keywords|<$edit-text field="Associations" class="text-bar"/>| <$list filter="[field:Personal[0]!field:Personal[1]]">

Project Description

<$transclude tiddler={{!!ProjectName}} field=ResumeDescription/>

Experience Text:

<$edit-text field="Description" class = "tw-edit-texteditor myTextEdit" tag="textarea"/>

General Notes:

<$edit-text field="Notes" class = "tw-edit-texteditor myTextEdit" tag="textarea"/> <$button> <$list filter="[all[current]field:Personal[0]!field:Personal[1]]"> Generate Linked Experience <$macrocall $name="GenerateLinked" EmpName = {{!!Name}} ProjName = {{!!ProjectName}} /> <$list filter="[all[current]!field:Personal[0]field:Personal[1]]"> Generate Personal Experience <$macrocall $name="GeneratePersonal" EmpName = {{!!Name}} ProjName = {{!!ProjectName}} /> <$button> Clear Form <>
Associations: project management, risk, constructability, project controls, schedule
Description: Matt performed detailed forensic schedule analysis and review.
Name: Matthew Read
Services: project management, risk, constructability, project controls, schedule
